question: In recent times, the term “Digital Globe” was making news. It is a / an __:
option4: Movement in favour of net neutrality
explanation: Digital Globe is the high resolution satellite owned by Washington based think tank – Institute for Science and International Security (ISIS). As per the recent report of this think tank, 4th nuclear reactor at Pakistan’s Khushab Complex has become operational. Pakistan has not provided any public information about this nuclear reactor construction.
